articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Indians lead the list for immigrants getting citizenship in wealthy nations - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Nearly 1.3 lakh Indians got OECD citizenship in 2021, with US leading the 38-country list with 56,000 citizenship grants, Australia coming in second at 24,000, and Canada third at 21,000
articles.content: India's ties with Canada may be at their worst now but the North American continued to see a large number of Indian immigrants with 21,000 of them getting citizenship in 2021, an OECD report has said… [+1668 chars]
